# particleTexture

**Instance Property**

The texture to use to render a particle.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var particleTexture: SKTexture? { get set }
```

```swift
var particleTexture: SKTexture? { get set }
```

## Discussion

A particle is rendered as if it were a [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKSpriteNode] object. The default value is `nil`, which means a single-color rectangle is used to draw the particle. If a non-`nil` value is specified, then the texture is colorized and used to draw particles.

## Changing a Particle’s Source Image and Size

- **particleSize**: The starting size of each particle.
